verses.verse: שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי <WH8199> sha-fe-Te-ni Judge אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him me O God וְרִ֘יבָ֤ה <WH7378> ve-Ri-Vah and plead רִיבִ֗י <WH7379> ri-Vi, my cause מִגּ֥וֹי <WH1471> mig-Goy nation לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not חָסִ֑יד <WH2623> cha-Sid; godly מֵ֤אִישׁ־ <WH376> Me-'ish- man מִרְמָ֖ה <WH4820> mir-Mah me from the deceitful וְעַוְלָ֣ה <WH5766> ve-'av-Lah and unjust תְפַלְּטֵֽנִי׃ <WH6403> te-fal-le-Te-ni. O deliver

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּ֤ה׀ <WH859> 'at-Tah You אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei For thou [art] the God מָֽעוּזִּי֮ <WH4581> ma-'uz-Zi of my strength לָמָ֪ה <WH4100> la-Mah why זְנַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי <WH2186> ze-Nach-Ta-ni why dost thou cast me off לָֽמָּה־ <WH4100> lam-mah- Why קֹדֵ֥ר <WH6937> ko-Der I mourning אֶתְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <WH1980> 'et-hal-Lech, ;why go בְּלַ֣חַץ <WH3906> be-La-chatz because of the oppression אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> o-Yev. of the enemy

שְׁלַח־ <WH7971> she-lach- O send out אוֹרְךָ֣ <WH216> 'or-Cha thy light וַ֭אֲמִתְּךָ <WH571> Va-'a-mit-te-cha and thy truth הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah them יַנְח֑וּנִי <WH5148> yan-Chu-ni; let them lead יְבִיא֥וּנִי <WH935> ye-vi-'U-ni me let them bring אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַֽר־ <WH2022> har- hill קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <WH6944> kod-she-cha me unto thy holy וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4908> mish-ke-no-Tei-cha. and to thy tabernacles

וְאָב֤וֹאָה׀ <WH935> ve-'a-Vo-'ah Then will I go אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מִזְבַּ֬ח <WH4196> miz-Bach unto the altar אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, of God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֵל֮ <WH410> 'el unto God שִׂמְחַ֪ת <WH8057> sim-Chat my exceeding גִּ֫ילִ֥י <WH1524> gi-Li joy וְאוֹדְךָ֥ <WH3034> ve-'od-Cha will I praise בְכִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> ve-chin-Nor, yea upon the harp אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him thee O God אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai. my God

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י׀ <WH7817> tish-To-cha-Chi Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> naf-Shi any וּֽמַה־ <WH4100> u-mah- Why תֶּהֱמִ֪י <WH1993> te-he-Mi disturbed עָ֫לָ֥י <WH5921> 'a-Lai within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <WH3176> ho-Chi-li within me;hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> Le-lo-him in God כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ע֣וֹד <WH5750> od shall again אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ <WH3034> o-Den-nu; for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת <WH3444> ye-shu-'Ot him [who is] the health פָּ֝נַ֗י <WH6440> pa-Nai, of my countenance וֵֽאלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> Ve-lo-Hai. and my God
